statements: SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email, relationship FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relationship = 'Family';
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC, contact_email ASC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relationship = 'Family';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT contact_name, relationship FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%@gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_name ILIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_id = 1;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY contact_name ASC, contact_id DESC;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM emergency_contacts WHERE contact_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT e.contact_id, e.contact_name, n.emergency_type, n.emergency_message FROM emergency_contacts e JOIN emergency_notifications n ON e.contact_id = n.contact_id;
SELECT e.contact_name, e.contact_phone, n.emergency_type FROM emergency_contacts e LEFT JOIN emergency_notifications n ON e.contact_id = n.contact_id WHERE n.emergency_type = 'Fire';
SELECT e.contact_name, e.contact_phone, n.emergency_message FROM emergency_contacts e RIGHT JOIN emergency_notifications n ON e.contact_id = n.contact_id WHERE n.notification_id < 5;
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT contact_id, name, relationship FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relationship='Family';
SELECT * FROM emergencies WHERE location='Hospital' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT emergency_type, timestamp FROM emergencies WHERE emergency_type='Medical' AND location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT * FROM emergency_contacts ORDER BY name ASC, contact_id DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE relationship='Family' OR relationship='Friend';
SELECT e.emergency_type, e.timestamp, c.name AS contact_name FROM emergencies e INNER JOIN emergency_contacts c ON e.emergency_id = c.contact_id;
SELECT * FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_sent = TRUE ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, phone_number, relationship, COUNT(*) AS num_emergencies FROM emergency_contacts ec JOIN notification_logs nl ON ec.contact_id = nl.contact_id GROUP BY name, phone_number, relationship;
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_phone FROM contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '+1%';
SELECT * FROM emergencies ORDER BY emergency_timestamp DESC;

SELECT contact_name, emergency_type, emergency_description FROM contacts JOIN contact_emergency ON contacts.contact_id = contact_emergency.contact_id JOIN emergencies ON emergencies.emergency_id = contact_emergency.emergency_id;
SELECT * FROM contacts;
SELECT contact_name, contact_email FROM contacts WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%123%';

SELECT contact_name, contact_phone, emergency_type, emergency_location FROM contacts INNER JOIN contact_emergency ON contacts.contact_id = contact_emergency.contact_id INNER JOIN emergencies ON contact_emergency.emergency_id = emergencies.emergency_id;

SELECT contact_name, emergency_type, emergency_location, notification_timestamp FROM contacts INNER JOIN contact_emergency ON contacts.contact_id = contact_emergency.contact_id INNER JOIN emergencies ON contact_emergency.emergency_id = emergencies.emergency_id INNER JOIN notifications ON contact_emergency.notification_id = notifications.notification_id WHERE notification_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_name, COUNT(*) AS emergency_count FROM contacts INNER JOIN contact_emergency ON contacts.contact_id = contact_emergency.contact_id GROUP BY contact_name ORDER BY emergency_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, event_name, event_location FROM users JOIN user_events ON users.user_id = user_events.user_id JOIN events ON user_events.event_id = events.event_id;
SELECT log_id, user_id, notification_message, notification_time FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT contact_id, name, email, phone_number FROM emergency_contacts WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email, emergency_contact_id FROM users WHERE pin < 1000 ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2021-12-31' ORDER BY event_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, user_id, event_id FROM user_events WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, user_id, notification_message, notification_time FROM notification_logs WHERE notification_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY notification_time DESC LIMIT 5;
